title: Individual Activity - Test driven development of double calculator with square root and FSM Error Messages

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this exercise is to further practice test-driven development to finish the second delivery of the Calculator (with Square Root and FSM Error Messages).
